counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of vertex shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: HS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of hull shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: DS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of domain shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of geometry shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: FS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of fragment shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: CS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of compute shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the GPU has been processing GPU commands.

counter.name: EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were actively processing.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were stalled.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Both FPU Pipes Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which both EU FPU pipelines were actively processing.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS FPU0 Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS FPU1 Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS Send Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: PS FPU0 Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: PS FPU1 Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: PS Send Pipeline Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: FS Both FPU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which fragment shaders were processed actively on the both FPUs.

counter.name: Sampler00 Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which Slice0 Sampler0 has been processing EU requests.

counter.name: Sampler10 Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which Slice1 Sampler0 has been processing EU requests.

counter.name: Samplers Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers have been processing EU requests.
counter.equation: $SubsliceMask 1 AND $Sampler00Busy FMUL $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND $Sampler10Busy FMUL FADD $SubsliceMask 1 AND $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND FADD FDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Sampler00 Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which Slice0 Sampler0 has been slowing down the pipe when processing EU requests.

counter.name: Sampler10 Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which Slice1 Sampler0 has been slowing down the pipe when processing EU requests.

counter.name: Rasterized Pixels
counter.description: The total number of rasterized pixels.

counter.name: Early Hi-Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early hierarchical depth test.

counter.name: Early Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early depth test.

counter.name: Samples Killed in FS
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in fragment shaders.

counter.name: Pixels Failing Tests
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS alpha, stencil, or depth tests.

counter.name: Samples Written
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: Samples Blended
counter.description: The total number of blended samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: Sampler Texels
counter.description: The total number of texels seen on input (with 2x2 accuracy) in all sampler units.

counter.name: Sampler Texels Misses
counter.description: The total number of texels lookups (with 2x2 accuracy) that missed L1 sampler cache.

counter.name: Sampler Cache Misses
counter.description: The total number of sampler cache misses in all LODs in all sampler units.
counter.equation: $SliceMask 1 AND B 4 READ UMUL $SliceMask 1 >> 1 AND B 5 READ UMUL UADD 8 UMUL

counter.name: SLM Bytes Read
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from shared local memory.

counter.name: SLM Bytes Written
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written into shared local memory.

counter.name: Shader Memory Accesses
counter.description: The total number of shader memory accesses to L3.

counter.name: Shader Atomic Memory Accesses
counter.description: The total number of shader atomic memory accesses.

counter.name: L3 Lookup Accesses w/o IC
counter.description: The total number of L3 cache lookup accesses w/o IC.

counter.name: L3 Misses
counter.description: The total number of L3 misses.

counter.name: L3 Sampler Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between samplers and L3 caches.

counter.name: L3 Shader Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between shaders and L3 caches w/o URB.
counter.equation: A 30 READ A 31 READ UADD A 32 READ UADD 64 UMUL

counter.name: Shader Barrier Messages
counter.description: The total number of shader barrier messages.

counter.name: GTI Depth Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between depth caches and GTI.

counter.name: GTI Fixed Pipe Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between 3D Pipeline (Command Dispatch, Input Assembly and Stream Output) and GTI.
counter.equation: C 4 READ C 5 READ UADD 64 UMUL

counter.name: GTI RCC Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between render color caches and GTI.
counter.equation: C 0 READ C 1 READ UADD 128 UMUL

counter.name: GTI L3 Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between L3 caches and GTI.

counter.name: GTI Read Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from GTI.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GTI Write Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Samplers Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers have been slowing down the pipe when processing EU requests.
counter.equation: $SubsliceMask 1 AND $Sampler00Bottleneck FMUL $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND $Sampler10Bottleneck FMUL FADD $SubsliceMask 1 AND $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND FADD FDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview Indicate System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Thread Occupancy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which hardware threads occupied EUs.
counter.equation: 8 A 13 READ FMUL $EuThreadsCount FDIV $EuCoresTotalCount UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Typed Bytes Read
counter.description: The total number of typed memory bytes read via Data Port.
counter.equation: $SubsliceMask 1 AND B 0 READ UMUL $SubsliceMask 1 >> 1 AND B 1 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 2 >> 1 AND B 2 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND B 3 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 4 >> 1 AND B 4 READ UMUL UADD 64 UMUL

counter.name: Typed Bytes Written
counter.description: The total number of untyped memory bytes written via Data Port.
counter.equation: $SubsliceMask 1 AND B 5 READ UMUL $SubsliceMask 1 >> 1 AND B 6 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 2 >> 1 AND B 7 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND C 0 READ UMUL UADD $SubsliceMask 4 >> 1 AND C 1 READ UMUL UADD 64 UMUL

counter.name: Untyped Bytes Read
counter.description: The total number of typed memory bytes read via Data Port.
counter.equation: $EuSubslicesTotalCount $SubsliceMask 1 AND C 2 READ FMUL $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND C 3 READ FMUL FADD FMUL $SubsliceMask 1 AND $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND FADD FDIV 64 UMUL

counter.name: Untyped Writes
counter.description: The total number of untyped memory bytes written via Data Port.
counter.equation: $EuSubslicesTotalCount $SubsliceMask 1 AND C 4 READ FMUL $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND C 5 READ FMUL FADD FMUL $SubsliceMask 1 AND $SubsliceMask 3 >> 1 AND FADD FDIV 64 UMUL

counter.description: The average rate of IPC calculated for 2 FPU pipelines.

counter.name: EU Thread Occupancy

counter.name: Sampler Texels

counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Subslice0)
counter.equation: B 2 READ B 3 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Subslice1 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Subslice1)
counter.equation: B 4 READ B 5 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Subslice2 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Subslice2)
counter.equation: B 6 READ B 7 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice1 Subslice0 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice1 Subslice0)
counter.equation: C 0 READ C 1 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice1 Subslice1 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice1 Subslice1)
counter.equation: C 2 READ C 3 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV
